content.question: Based on the passage, which of the following developments of the French Revolution would Priestley have most likely opposed?

choices.label: The formulation of the Declaration of the Rights of Man and the Citizen
The creation of a meritocracy in the government and military
The fixing of prices and wages to combat inflation
The institution of the Reign of Terror

content.answer: The institution of the Reign of Terror

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
